altername_name: ナニワ金融道 青木雄二の世間胸算用
name: Naniwa Kinyuudou: Aoki Yuji no Seken Munazanyou
overview: Naniwa Ninyuu Michi - Aoki Yuuji no Seken Munazanyou is classic board game that can be played by up to 4 human players and got a financial theme. The goal of the game is to reach more than 11.000.000 money and the player that reaches that first win the game. To do that the player have to spin the roulette and advance to the board that represents Naniwa (Osaka today) and ear money in different places of the town (loans, buying and selling things, gambling, etc).
